title: [SECURITY] Upgrade Node.js from v18 to v20 LTS
body:
## Problem
Node.js 18 reaches EOL in April 2025. We need to upgrade to v20 LTS.

## Impact
- Security vulnerabilities after EOL
- Missing performance improvements
- Incompatibility with newer packages

## Tasks
- [ ] Update .nvmrc to v20
- [ ] Update GitHub Actions workflows
- [ ] Update Docker base images
- [ ] Test all dependencies compatibility
- [ ] Update documentation

## Acceptance Criteria
- All CI/CD pipelines use Node.js 20
- Local development uses Node.js 20
- All tests pass
- No npm warnings

## Priority: HIGH
## Effort: 5 story points
